actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt employees engaged in livestock brand inspections from the overtime compensation provisions of that Act.

summary.text: Exempts employees engaged in livestock brand inspections from the overtime compensation provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt employees engaged in livestock brand inspections from the overtime compensation provisions of that Act.
